Weapon.Name: Time Shard Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger that looks as if it was chiseled out of a solid piece of time itself, pulsating with temporal energy.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the dagger pierces the enemy, time around them begins to distort, slowing their movements.

Weapon.Name: Quantum Blade
Weapon.Description: A sword crafted from quantum energy, capable of cutting through the very fabric of reality.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: With a swift motion, reality bends, slicing the enemy across multiple points in time.

Weapon.Name: Echoes of the Past
Weapon.Description: An enigmatic staff that resonates with the echoes of times long past, imbued with the power to manipulate memories.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The air shimmers as forgotten memories assail the enemy, leaving them bewildered.
